entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main protagonist of the story, mentioned as being unable to move due to Dumbledore's spell.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: A character who has cast a spell that imprisons Harry Potter.

entities.name: draco malfoy
entities.description: A character who is being ordered to cast a curse by the woman.

entities.name: snape
entities.description: A character who is standing on the ramparts and has a wand in his hand.

entities.name: amykus
entities.description: A character who is speaking to Snape and has a lumpy appearance.

entities.name: the woman
entities.description: A character who is screeching orders at Draco Malfoy.

entities.name: the death eaters
entities.description: A group of characters who are present on the ramparts.

entities.name: the boy
entities.description: Harry Potter is referred to as 'the boy' in this context.

relationships.description: Snape walked forwards and pushed Dumbledore.
